Text: Thanks Toomin, I spent so much time looking for decent copies of these, I really appreciate you posting the seasons and I will make sure I seed them so you can get all 10 (I hope) up!
@themorningstar69: Thanks, glad to hear it.

Therefore I sincerely hope you can upload all ten seasons, I will seed for the benefit of all. Thanks very much!!!
